itinerary.title: Arrival & Meenakshi Temple
itinerary.details: Arrive in Madurai, check-in to your hotel. Evening visit to the magnificent Meenakshi Amman Temple to witness the temple ritual.

itinerary.title: City Historical Tour
itinerary.details: Explore Thirumalai Nayakkar Mahal, Gandhi Museum, and the local vibrant markets for famous silk sarees.

itinerary.title: Alagar Koyil & Departure
itinerary.details: Morning visit to Alagar Koyil temple located in scenic hills. Post lunch, transfer to airport/station for departure.

itinerary.title: Mist & Lake
itinerary.details: Arrival at Kodaikanal. Check-in. Evening spent cycling around the star-shaped Kodai Lake and local shopping.

itinerary.title: Scenic Viewpoints
itinerary.details: Full day tour including Cois Walk, Upper Lake View, Moir Point, and the famous Pillar Rocks.

itinerary.title: Nature's Trail
itinerary.details: Visit Pine Forest, Guna Caves, and Bryant Park. Enjoy the serene beauty of the botanical gardens.

itinerary.title: Farewell to Kodai
itinerary.details: Leisurely breakfast. Visit local chocolate makers. Departure from the hill station with sweet memories.

itinerary.title: The Big Temple
itinerary.details: Arrival. Visit the UNESCO world heritage Brihadisvara Temple, an architectural marvel of the Chola era.

itinerary.title: Palace & Arts
itinerary.details: Visit Thanjavur Palace complex and the historic library. Witness the making of Thanjavur paintings before departure.
